name: Paddock Straw Mattress: Makeshift Bed
description: A straw mat made from soft feathers and straw. Despite its appearance, it is remarkably soft and plush, making it ideal not only as bedding for saurians and other large creatures, but also as a makeshift bed for humans. It is said that many Natlanese are highly adept at crafting these mats, and none more so than the Scions of the Canopy, who spend much of their time living in the open country. After all, a clean, comfortable, and easy-to-make "makeshift bed" can prove invaluable out in the wilds...
